channel.title: Greedy on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Greedy on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 624 Maximum Distance in Arrays
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 624 Question You are given m arrays, where each array is sorted in ascending order.

item.title: Problem 3216 Lexographically Smallest String After a Swap
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3216 Question Given a string s containing only digits, return the lexicographically smallest string that can be obtained after swapping adjacent digits in s with the same parity at most once.

item.title: Problem 860 Lemonade Change
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 860 Question At a lemonade stand, each lemonade costs $5.

item.title: Problem 3016 Minimum Number of Pushes to Type Word II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3016 Question You are given a string word containing lowercase English letters.

item.title: Problem 787 Cheapest Flights Within K Stops
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 787 Question There are n cities connected by some number of flights.

item.title: Problem 55 Jump Game
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 55 Question You are given an integer array nums.

item.title: Problem 1605 Find Valid Matrix Given Row and Column Sums
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1605 Question You are given two arrays rowSum and colSum of non-negative integers where rowSum[i] is the sum of the elements in the ith row and colSum[j] is the sum of the elements of the jth column of a 2D matrix.

item.title: Problem 1509 Minimum Difference Between Largest and Smallest Value in Three Moves
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1509 Question You are given an integer array nums.

item.title: Problem 826 Most Profit Assigning Work
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 826 Question You have n jobs and m workers.

item.title: Problem 502 IPO
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 502 Question Suppose LeetCode will start its IPO soon.

item.title: Problem 945 Minimum Increment to Make Array Unique
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 945 Question You are given an integer array nums.

item.title: Problem 2037 Minimum Number of Moves to Seat Everyone
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2037 Question There are n seats and n students in a room.

item.title: Problem 846 Hand of Straights
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 846 Question Alice has some number of cards and she wants to rearrange the cards into groups so that each group is of size groupSize, and consists of groupSize consecutive cards.

item.title: Problem 3068 Find the Maximum Sum of Node Values
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3068 Question There exists an undirected tree with n nodes numbered 0 to n - 1.

item.title: Problem 861 Score After Flipping Matrix
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 861 Question You are given an m x n binary matrix grid.

item.title: Problem 3075 Maximize Happiness of Selected Children
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3075 Question You are given an array happiness of length n, and a positive integer k.

item.title: Problem 881 Boats to Save People
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 881 Question You are given an array people where people[i] is the weight of the ith person, and an infinite number of boats where each boat can carry a maximum weight of limit.
